sentence.Network_en: I was very glad to convene them all together one afternoon at Chequers.
sentence.Network_cn: 一天下午,我很高兴地把他们召集到契克斯.

auth_sentence.content: Powell called the Prime Minister, who was at Chequers, his country retreat.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Powell called the Prime Minister, who was at Chequers, his country retreat.

auth_sentence.content: When he reached Chequers, Neville Chamberlain liked to unwind by measuring the girth of the trees.

auth_sentence.content: Mrs Thatcher was amused and flattered by the impersonation of her, and Janet was a regular guest at Downing Street and Chequers.
